column2: VARDESC
At any time in your life, have you ever been unfairly fired?
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
For unfair reasons, have you ever not been hired for a job?
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
Have you ever been unfairly denied a promotion?
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
Have you ever been unfairly stopped, searched, questioned, physically threatened or abused by the police?
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
Have you ever been unfairly discouraged by a teacher or advisor from continuing your education?
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
Have you ever been unfairly prevented from moving into a neighborhood because the landlord or a realtor refused to sell or rent you a house or apartment?
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
Have you ever moved into a neighborhood where neighbors made life difficult for you or your family?
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
Have you ever been unfairly denied a bank loan?
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
Have you ever received service from someone such as a plumber or car mechanic that was worse than what other people get?
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
In your day-to-day life, how often have any of the following things happened to you?  You have been treated with less courtesy than other people
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
In your day-to-day life, how often have any of the following things happened to you?  You have been treated with less respect than other people
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
In your day-to-day life, how often have any of the following things happened to you?  You have received poorer service than other people at restaurants or stores
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
In your day-to-day life, how often have any of the following things happened to you?  People have acted as if they think you are not smart
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
In your day-to-day life, how often have any of the following things happened to you?  People have acted as if they are afraid of you
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
In your day-to-day life, how often have any of the following things happened to you?  People have acted as if they think you are dishonest
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
In your day-to-day life, how often have any of the following things happened to you?  People have acted as if they're better than you are
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
In your day-to-day life, how often have any of the following things happened to you?  You have been called names or insulted
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
In your day-to-day life, how often have any of the following things happened to you?  You have been threatened or harassed
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
In your day-to-day life, how often have any of the following things happened to you?  You have been followed around in stores
If "yes" follow-up with: What do you think was the main reason for this experience?
